Category:Red Keep1412463os8itn9nkfsoqmr8wikf9drs980wztz1606832014-09-27T16:53:47ZThe Dragon Demands5014364[[File:Red Keep.png|thumb|Red Keep at King's Landing.]]


The Red Keep is the castle at King's Landing and the seat of power for the Kings of Westeros. It was built at the site of the landing of the army of the Aegon the Conqueror.
